title: Darden Studio
content:
The Darden Studio produces and publishes the typeface designs of [Joshua Darden](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Darden) and his collaborators.

_Typefaces:_  
Freight Big  
Freight Display  
Freight Text  
Freight Micro  
Freight Sans  
Jubilat  
Birra  
Omnes  
Omnes Pro  
Corundum Text

Site: [http://www.dardenstudio.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235817/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/ "http://www.dardenstudio.com/")
author: exfish
